Traits.Name: Disgorge
Traits.Description: When vigor is broken, summon a natal in range 2.

Traits.Name: Last Revenge
Traits.Description: When reduce to 0 HP, explodes in a blast 1 area effect. Non-demons in the area are blighted. Summon 2 Natals in the area.

Traits.Name: Venomous
Traits.Description: Inflict poisoned on any attacker if struck by a melee attack.
